You can also use the mouth to clean spoons which is a little bit of a gimmick but it still works incredibly well. My favourite feature is cleaning cups with the scrub daddy. Just stick your fingers in the eyes and twist it in a cup. It’s as good as new! I love this sponge and i’m definitely buying more!

reviews: I have been using Daddario phosphor bronze for last 3 years. Excellent sound quality in budget range.. If you play regularly, they will easily last upto 5 months, until they get rusted. Tuning stability is good, but initially they might get detuned due to phosphor coating slippage.To check for ordinal daddario, always remember that there will a matt rubber type coating on the packet surface and inside packet, there will be a unique code which you can verify on official daddario site

name: Nautica Men's Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt-Multi Packs
reviews: The fabric in these Tshirts was very nice and soft, but of a much lighter weight than other Nautica Tshirts we've purchased. They have the Nautica logo printed on them but I don't know if they're knock-offs or the real thing. They're OK and will be worn, but we wouldn't have ordered them, or certainly not a pack of 5, if we'd known they were like this.

name: Nautica Men's Cotton V-Neck T-Shirt-Multi Packs

Así que son óptimos si vas a ejercitarte, pues absorben el sudor y secan más rápidamente que los primeros.El corte es perfecto, mantiene todo en su lugar sin sentir presión alguna.Definitivamente los recomendaría y volvería a comprar.Me sorprendieron gratamente.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: These are great t shirts, well made and good size.Washed well and did not shrink at all. Would recommend.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Hanes Beefy T has always been a nostalgic recognised brand and good to see time has not diminished that view, heavy weight cotton, great fit and well finished.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Even unwrapping these t-shirts I knew they were going to be big. Upon donning them I was right, they are huge. In fact I bought another brand at the same time also in XXL and laying one on top of the other showed a significant difference in size. The Hanes Beefy shirts are at least 3XL using other makes as a guide. It's not a huge issue, I wear tees in winter for layering, but they're so big they look daggy at the neck, the only part that shows. Made in Haiti so it's gratifying to see manufacturing in poor countries adjacent to the US. They are thick as advertised, but in the absence of significant shrinkage I'd go a size down, hoping of course that the size difference is consistent across the Hanes Beefy range (i.e. one size too big). The image shown has Aquagard T-shirts in XXL on top of the Hanes in XXL and the difference is significant- and the yellow shirts were larger than other XXL tees I've purchased recently.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Great deal on a genuine Hanes product.Next day delivery.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Nice t.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Great quality but I ordered large which is my usual size in Europe/Australia and they are way too big - too long by 10 cms, and the shoulders are far too wide and the arm holes are huge. The only area they fit is across the chest. Returned.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: I bought both types of these tshirts and the not beefy ones are a bit see through. Not these  ones. Well sized and comfortable.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: These are comfortable and long-wearing t-shirts.  Perfect for wearing with jeans or under a casual shirt with chinos.  Recommended.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: The material is nice, and thicker than a standard hanes shirt. However I wouldn't call these heavyweight shirts, they feel light, my other beefy hanes shirts have a higher gsm and weight.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: The quality is always good with Haynes T-Shirts but the sizing is terrible. I ordered XL and they are 48" chest size and not 42-44". Very disappointed.Gary Playfoot

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: The only ones you can be sure will keep their neck shape

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Great boxy fit at 2XL on 6’3”

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: I ordered  2 different colours in XL - red and blue.  They arrived seperately and the red was manufactured in Ethiopia while the blue was manufactured in Haiti. I have been wearing and washing both colours for a few months and find that the red has way too big a neck opening  compared to the blue and hence does not feel as good a fit around the neck and shoulder area making me not want to wear the red at all.I am very happy with the quality of the fabric and really like the Haynes beefy T's , but I am now wary of ordering some more as I dont know which colour/manufacturer combinations are which.You should expect consistent quality between the manufacturing locations.

reviews: Proper length, fit and material for beefy t's.Lately some beefy's have been a bit short and made from cheaper material, but not these!

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Wanted a good quality t-shirt that actually fitted me, and that is what I recieved. I am about 5'9 and ordered a medium. The t-shirts themselves are not exactly a thick material, but they're not thin, they feel smooth. If there was one thing I would say, it's that they are a tiny bit too long on the torso, not as bad as some t-shirts that claim to be a medium, but it would be the perfect t-shirt, if it wasn't just that inch too long on the torso (but this is just my preference, I prefer a shorter torso length on a t-shirt).

reviews: Good shirts, great way to order a gem.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Diese T-Shirts sind wunderbar
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 October 2023

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: I bought these for my husband months ago and they are still in great shape. He works for a tree company and his clothes generally get ripped, stained, and ruined after just a few weeks (and many times, days!)These two shirts are worn at least once or twice per week, while working, and are in the same shape as when I bought them. There are no holes or rips anywhere on the shirts and they are just as strong as when I received them. Stains are impossible to avoid, but the shirt couldn't be of better quality and durability even months after purchasing them.The color and description are the same as pictured and described by the seller.This is a great deal on two high quality Men's short sleeved t-shirts, and I would definitively recommend them!I bought these shirts at full price. When I'm very satisfied with a purchase, I like to give a review and hopefully help or answer some questions potential buyers may have.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 28 September 2016

reviews: I've had these t-shirts I'm white and I love them! They do shrink a little but they are a perfect fit for me.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews:
Amazing t-shirts, well made and comfortable and more importantly 100% cotton, I hate any synthetic fabric touching my skin. I'm 178 cm, about 80 kg, the large fits me just right, not too tight, not too loose including the collar and long enough.I don't find the fabric is too thick, in fact, it is thinner than the other Hanes t-shirts I have bought
  
Hanes Men's 2 Pack Short Sleeve Pocket Beefy-T, Deep Forest, Large







  
  
    and they should be just fine for hot summer days.When you put it on out of the box it may feel just a bit on the 'rough' side but after an hour or so, you won't even notice it. When you touch the fabric it feels really soft.The color (I bought the so-called 'deep red' is a bit brighter than on product photo. I'm a guy who doesn't like bright colors but this one is just about as bright as I can accept it. In fact, it's a kind of unique red that I really like that will make you stand out from the crowd in a good way. And if you running or ride a bike, for sure you'll get noticed especially when crossing an intersection which is a good thing.As for shrinkage, just like with any 100% cotton t-shirt if you take proper care of it, like wash it in cold water, air dry it, you'll enjoy it for a long time.All in all a great product at a great price and I'm very happy with it!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 21 December 2018

name: Lucky Brand
reviews: It's a very nice, soft and comfortable t-shirt. It's warm - think Canadian summer wear, so its good for a sunny autumn/spring Australian day. The look is very authentic 'well worn'. I have some lucky brand denim shorts that I get a lot of wear out of every summer so I bought this on special (<$20) for someone, but I've worn it and it definitely feels like ' a favourite shirt'. I wouldn't pay $60 for it though, lol, unless you really need an old t-shirt fast because someone has just thrown all your clothes out and you really need that soft, cuddly feel.

name: Lucky Brand
reviews: Really pleased with the style and fit. It comes from the states, but was here within a week. I'm on the border between medium and large depending on the brand, I risked a medium and pleased to say this is a perfect fit, not tight, but also not too baggy. The material is very soft and thin, making it great for hot weather. I chose the dark olive which looks exactly like the photos. I'll definitely be ordering more of these!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 5 July 2022

name: Lucky Brand
reviews: I’ll start with the cons. After a few washes, the shirts pile up. (Tiny little cotton balls that pile up everywhere on the shirt) the colors do indeed fade, but who cares, it still looks good. I hardly ever gotten compliments on shirts but I did with these shirts but I didn’t get the shirts for that reason. They are very comfortable and have a great fit. Especially if you’re in the slightly athletic and up, build. Nice fit on the biceps. But not too tight, nice fit around the chest. It even accentuates your back quite well too. Look, they shirts are 20 bucks. Buy a couple colors you like, if you like them a lot, but one or two more of that same color and put them away for when they stop selling these shirts. They are worth the cons that everyone talks about.To make them last longer and keep their size. Never dry them using any heat, not even the delicate setting. I hang dry all of mine. I think air fluff dryer setting would work fine. Machine wash gentle. Even as they fade or “pile” up, they are still a much better looking shirt than any logo or solid color tee. Buy one! You’ll love it.True to size. Good length. I’m 6’4” 210, about a 40cm bicep. Sleeves are slightly snug on my arms for a nice look.

name: Lucky Brand
reviews: These shirts are a great alternative to men's T-shirts. They are stylish and come in many colors (I own about 12 different colors). The ONLY thing to know about them is that they wear out quickly (like 2 seasons). I wear mine a lot (7 months out of the year they are my main t-shirt), so they get washed a lot and quickly take on the faded (burn-out) look. It's a nice look up to a point, and then the shirts just look threadbare. But at $20-35 per shirt (depending on when I buy them) they are still a great deal if they last only 2 years. The fabrics vary from color to color, even though you'd think they are all made of the same stuff. For instance, the "white" color clearly has more cotton in the blend and will last longer. Some colors, seemingly randomly, last longer than others. But again, they ALL look great when new and I get compliments on them all the time. Several of my male friends have pretty much abandoned their old t-shirts in favor of a collection of the Venice Burn-out shirts. I sure I'll be buying more of them!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 16 September 2023

reviews: These are great containers. I had a bunch of red colour containers before and these added different colour so I can store different things to separate. Easy to take straight from fridge and reheat the food. Decor quality. Highly recommended!

reviews: I like these containers because I can freeze,defrost and heat leftovers in the microwave. They are good quality and I highly recommend them.

reviews: The colours of this 3 set are sooo nice! Makes a change from the usual red. They hold quite a lot and are good for lunches, or for leftovers. They are easy to wash and can be stored by stacking them up in the cupboard so very convenient. Just a word of warning though, the lids break easily.

name: Decor Microsafe Decor Oblong Jewel Container, Pack of 3 Pieces, 900ml Capacity, Assorted
reviews: I have used these containers for my daily meals at work and found them to be decent, but I think they could be improved upon compared to the Sistema brand.The containers seal food well and are of reasonable size. However, I do not prefer using them to heat food in the microwave as the lids tend to warp due to being made from plastic.On the other hand, I found them to be good for storing food in the freezer. Unfortunately, one of the lids broke due to the temperature change from cold to hot. I washed them several times in the dishwasher, and it was okay.Moreover, the containers are extremely convenient for storage, as well as the lids. A highly positive aspect of the product.Overall, I liked the product, especially for storing fruits!

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: This is hands down the best PC case you can find for a very fair price. If it's your first time building a PC, then I definitely recommend you this case as it's sooooo easy to install everything in it and it will take around 2 hours to install everything inside it meanwhile normally with other cases... it could take up to 5 hours. It also comes with 3 RGB fans which cost 30$ each separately. The material and quality on this case is the best you can fund out there. And after all... it's CORSAIR.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Thats the best case I had ever.I am not sure If all cases are that good in the recent days but that made my life much more enjoyable while installing my PC.The best part of this case is that the cables are pre-alligned. You only need to route your PSU cables which is very simple as the bad boy comes with cable wrappers.It comes with anti-dust mat which can hopefully prevent dust getting in, I dont know how it affects the airflow but it works well for my mid-high end pc with decent cpu/gpu temp.The rubbered legs are with good quality. Fans are not noisy as well. Only thing is the side panels are only attached via a hook, It can drop the panel if you open the side panels quickly.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: This is the 3rd 4000D case that I've bought.  Fits a 3070 or 4070 graphics card and has a good ergonomic layout for gaming or work.  Recommended.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Great case, spacious and well built. Two flaws, the built in RGB hub is missing its plastic housing, and one of the front fans has lost all LED functionality, which is a poor performance for a "RGB" case. Corsair support seems to be resolving it though. 7/10

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Too expensive, $250 is not cheap but it can fit 10 120mm fan inside and keep temps at 55 on a 35C+ hot day while working on it.Has plenty of room and was designed with water cooling in mind, very large case however, weighs 14kgs on its own.The HDD bay hasn't got enough clearance to fit with an average sized PSU, Corsair sell a PSU that fits comfortably but is also expensive, be sure to invest in SSDs instead and remove the HDD bay alltogether

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: First case I've bought in over 5 years, replacing my trusty Fractal Define R4, which was a very well insulated and quiet case.Building was very easy, and had proper cable management routing. The white lacquer paint where the motherboard sits on gets scratched easily, so be careful.Initial impressions was that it was noisy, but some fan tuning fixed that. As it is more airy, there will be more dust and that's where I'm hoping the dust filters do their job. Time will tell.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Received the case, undamaged. Excellent quality case for my pc build, but I had a few missing screws within the packaging. Asked amazon if they could send me some but they unfortunately were unable to. Great case though.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: So this is a nice minimalist case overall, but my previous case that I had was much better in terms of filtering dust. This case doesn't have a proper dust filter. Just a mesh and it gets dusty real fast. With this case I would need to dust out my pc every 6 months or less because it does start to pile up slowly whereas my other case I could leave it for 2 years or so because it had foam infront of the fan to filter that dust. Only complaint about it.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: It is a simple PC case and is easy to hide cables in the back which is good if you are bad at cable management. I would recommend it to anyone who just wants a PC case with reliable airflow and a place to hide cables in the back however if you plan to have a PC case on the table this one is a bit too big to carry outside to clean often. The desk must have at least a 600mm depth for the PC case to fit on it.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: The case worked like a dream, used for 13th gen intel and an RTX 3090. I decided to vertically mount my graphics card, the only problem is that you cannot see anything inside unless you have a ton of RGB. Apart from that Awesome temps and plenty of room for cable management

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: An excellent mid sized case with a glass side panel - be aware it is quite dark! I also heard that the glass panels are difficult to obtain in Australia. Other than that this is a well designed case. I removed the 3.5in HDD bay at the bottom and this gave me heaps more space behind the PSU. The bay also moves a bit forward if do you have 3.5in drives to give a bit more space for cables at the back of the PSU. There are heaps of options for different sized fans and rads. The back side has a channel for cables and it comes with screws and velco fasteners. Would recommend this product

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Great case for the price.I really like the look of the front with the tessellated triangles, and even better that the tempered glass side panel is offset by the open front with easily removable dust filter. The case overall is nice and open, which means that you don't have to worry about populating the case with fans and optimising the fan pressure to get air through.The back of the case is spacious enough to accommodate bulky cables, and the removable cable guide is a great touch to help route and tie cables together.The downsides are that the grey feet and the front parts are plastic which feels a bit cheap, and that there's fairly limited I/O, e.g. ONLY ONE USB-A port in the front which takes up an entire USB3.0 header on the motherboard. It would have made more sense having 2 USB-A ports and a USB-C port instead of one of each.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: This case is just very nice looking in every way, comes with 2 preinstalled Corsair SP Elite which are decent fans but if I knew the QL edition of this case existed I would have gotten it instead. Comes at the back wire lanes with Corsair velcro straps for easier cable management. Overall a very nice case.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: Im very happy with the case! to be honest I was actually a little shocked when it came SO early, it was said to arrive on the 30th of December but came today the 21st of December. I do wish it came with more protection for the glass panel, but otherwise is a very nice and good looking case. As you can see in one of the pictures there is masking tape holding down the meshing on the top of the case - which I was very happy about because that reassured me that the meshing wouldn't be crinkled or something lol.Would definitely recommend this to my friends (especially since their cases are close to needing a new upgrade lol)can't wait to build my pc, loving the case - I hope putting my parts into the case won't be too much of a hassle.

name: CORSAIR iCUE 4000X RGB Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - 3x SP120 RGB ELITE Fans - iCUE Lighting Node CORE Controller - High Airflow - Black
reviews: When removing the side panel, the glass shattered. While the side panel has retained its shape, the glass is visibly broken and will probably fall apart and explode if I attempt to use it.

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: Easy to figure out. Measures acurately

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: All very neutral- did what it was expected to do for a good price

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: I love This little garden tool!  I keep composting worms to break down our table scraps and create worm castings for my houseplants and vegetable garden. Worms need a high moisture environment and a relatively neutral pH to thrive and produce a lot of castings so I this meter dozens of times each week.Over the years, I’ve purchased more expensive devices for pH monitoring as well as the cheap moisture meters that are all over Amazon. None of them has worked well. Either they have given bad readings or they're too cumbersome to use easily.When I saw this soil meter, with its unique design, and multi-functionality, I decided to give it a try. i had very low expectations because of my other experiences.I'm so glad I did. this meter is easy to use and highly responsive to different soil conditions. When I move from each worm bin, the moisture readings change, as you would expect. Sometimes a little and sometimes a lot. And I believe the accuracy is good too. Soil that seems dry gives a lower reading than soil that I know is more wet.I don't have as much to say about the pH meter. All my readings are between 6.5 and just over 7, as I would expect.  But the readings do change from sample to sample so I'm confident it's working.I don't use the light meter regularly but when I check my houseplants, I get readings that seem about right.  Same with the nutrients setting.If I had one critique, I'd say that the scale on the pH meter could be more centered around 7. It ranges from 1 to 8. Any readings below 5 or above 9 aren't too useful for gardening, but easily being able to see if the pH is 6.75 or 7.25 would be.Other than that I'm thrilled with this device, especially for the price. If I broke it tomorrow, I wouldn't hesitate to buy another.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 1 March 2023

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: this item did not correctly show moist. plant was watered and the soil certainly moist but it showed as dry on all but one plant that was soaked due to accidental over watering. I cant rely on this to let me know plants need to be watered Prob was in far enough and tried it several times all with the same resultsUPDATE:New meter sent and works perfect I think I love this company they are quick to act when there is a problem I will def buy from here again

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: A very nice little tool, easy to read and easy to use.  Great to be able to tell if that plant really needs water or not!  I am hopeful the death rate of plants in our home will start going down in the weeks and months to come!Purchased by me, for me!Thanks.

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: This is NOT a paid or sponsored review (although I wouldn’t mind testing products for honest reviews). I bought this with my own money to try and give my own opinion.I bought this not expecting much, but I figured why not give it a try and see how it performs. Right out of the box it is surprisingly built well enough that I don’t feel like it’s going to break anytime soon although time will tell. It comes in a cheap box from China but it is packaged well to where it will not get banged around in shipping. When I first put this meter to the test I was surprised that the readings are pretty close to what the actual condition of the soil is. The light meter function works well in the sun. I was kind of bummed to see it will not work with my grow lights (it states this in the instructions but I tested anyway). The moisture feature is pretty accurate I first measured bone dry soil and it was accurate so I gradually added water and kept checking and the meter registered exactly what I was seeing. The nutrient function seems to be reading pretty accurate for what I believe to be in the soil but I’m skeptical of this I will have to do further testing on this function and compare with other meters and report back on this one. The PH function works as accurate as the other functions. I started with alkaline soil PH 7 and stuck the probe in and it registered it with no problem. I then started adding PH down (hydroponic ACID) to the water and added it to the soil. The meter registered the PH as acidic PH 3 which is accurate compared to digital PH meter and PH solution. Overall I’m impressed. This is a nice little meter for everyday gardening and to get an idea of how your soil and plants are doing. I wouldn’t use just this meter on prized plants and rely only on this meter but it is definitely worth having on hand.If this company has other products I would be willing to try the other products as well to see how they perform as well as recommend this product to friends.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 12 September 2022

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: Seems to work well. I use it almost exclusively for moisture readings.

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: So far, I have found this product to be easy to use and reasonably accurate IF the soil you are testing has a high enough moisture content.... so check for that first.  If the soil is too dry, water it first.  Wait a half hour or so and re-test for your pH and nutrient level.  I also find the pH scale to be a little hard to read accurately.

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: I use for my lawn. Some of my lawn is doing great, other areas not thriving. The measurements taken using this seems to match up to what I am seeing.Areas not thriving, ph is high and nutrient level low. Areas doing well have correct ph and decent nutrient reading.Helped me treat lawn as zones and hit with fertilizer a little heavier in some areas with lower nutrient levelYou will want to ensure that soil has some moisture to get accurate readings as it needs moisture to conduct signalI suspect this will save me money on lawn fertilizer over time. Once I get a baseline, I will know it's time to fertilize when I see reading dropThe ph reading seems fairly sensitive and although I don't have a control to compare it to. It seems to match up to what I am seeing in how well the grass is growing.From the directions, you should not pour or rinse with water. Wipe it with a towel and don't rinse it. I think if you leave in a pot, sensors will corrode and I will loose accuracy. Definitely don't want to water your plant while sensor is in pot.I was trying to figure out if it has battery or is solar powered or maybe powered by sensor electrodes. From what I can tell, there is no battery unless it is sealed inside with no cover.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 August 2023

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: Its fine, as described. Cons: probe is huge leaves a big hole in the soil. It takes a couple minutes to get a moisture reading. Not good for small pots unless you stand there and hold it. Otherwise, the top-heavy meter will tip the pot.  It doesn't appear to measure any amount of indirect/ambient sunlight. I've tried to measure the degree of indirect light in areas of a sunny room, trying to keep low light plants from burning. However, it only reacts to full sun near the window or in a beam of light, in which case it springs to the highest number. I found no way to measure degrees of light between full sun and darkness. Maybe its scientifically impossible with such a simple meter, but if thats the case, then its useless and they just shouldn't include it.. I haven't tried the PH or nutrient meters
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 March 2023

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: This piece is light years better than the cheap ones.  For instance, on the cheap green ones you find at your local hardware store would barely move the needle in my blueberry patch.  I had done everything I could think of to get the PH down but the meter wouldn't move.  I got one of these and made the same tests and discovered PH of between 4.0 and 5.5.  Holy Cow!  I was validated!  Yeah, I like this thing.  However, don't leave it outside to get rained on.  It's not water proof.  I had to take mine apart to clear out the moisture.  It's doable, but just ensure you don't NEED to do it.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 21 October 2023

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: Overall, I think the Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester is a great tool for any gardener. It is easy to use and provides accurate readings, which can help you to keep your plants healthy and thriving. The meter is also affordable and durable, making it a great value for the price.Here are my observations about the meter:Easy to use: The Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester is very easy to use. Simply insert the probe into the soil and wait for the reading to appear on the display. The meter has four different modes: soil moisture, pH, nutrients, and light.Consistent readings: The Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester provides consistent readings from test to test.Affordable: The Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester is very affordable and a great value for the features it offers.Durable: The Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester is made of durable materials and is designed to withstand the elements. I have been using the meter for several months now and it has held up well.If you are looking for a simple, affordable, and accurate way to test the soil in your garden, I highly recommend the Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester.

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: The PH sensor which is my primary reason for buying is the bottom narrowest gauge on the meter which is not the easiest to read.  The moisture and fertility gauges are easy to view. The instructions are ok but the print is pretty small. And watch for the little 2" square piece of sandpaper to scratch the tip to get the PH meter to work.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 19 May 2023

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: * The sunlight measuring function is not "hours of sunlight per day" as you might expect for a gardening meter, but rather an instantaneous photo-resistive measurement. In other words, if you expose the sensor to sunlight the needle goes up, and if you cover the sensor with your thumb the needle goes down. Not sure who this is useful for. Is there a population of people who cannot identify sunlit areas with their eyes, but who can read the meter with their eyes?* Real electronic pH meters need frequent calibration, so I have zero hope for the pH function.* The soil moisture sensing seems to work the same as any probe. In my opinion this is the only really useful function.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 September 2023

name: [Upgraded] Soil Moisture Meter, 4-in-1 Soil pH Tester, Soil Moisture/Light/Nutrients/pH Meter for Gardening, Lawn, Farming, Indoor & Outdoor Plants Use, No Batteries Required
reviews: I bought this for indoors, but the results are different when I compare it with a professional instrument I use outside. Under a rose bush: one told me the soil was acidic; the other (the pro instrument) that it was alkaline. I went with the latter and amended the soil which turned out to be correct.

name: Razer Viper Ultimate Lightweight Wireless Gaming Mouse & RGB Charging Dock: Hyperspeed Wireless Technology - 20K DPI Optical Sensor - 78g - Optical Mouse Switch - 70 Hr Battery - Quartz Pink
reviews: For only around $40 AUD, this mouse is probably the best lightweight gaming mouse to ever exist.It's quite crazy how they've been able to cram so many features for such a low price point and here are some of them:- The mouse comes at 61g, making it one of the lightest mice out there for sale. If you play FPS games such as CSGO and Valorant, you'll definitely find that the tracking on this mouse is relatively easy.- The Razer Viper Mini uses PTFE skates. For people who don't know what that is, PTFE is basically the material that manufacturers use to create non-stick pans. It works great on a mouse pad too though.- For RGB lovers out there, the Razer Viper Mini, unlike its other Viper variants, has RGB underglow. It looks great when you're not using it but you probably won't be able to see it when your hand is covering it. It's funny though because the Razer Viper Mini has more RGB features while weighing less than other mice.- The actual design of the mouse itself is probably why it's so popular. The Viper Mini is definitely one of the most comfortable mice I've used. It fits great on your hand and the mouse buttons are positioned well to reduce thumb movement. The speed flex cable that Razer uses is also great as the mouse essentially feels wireless and weighs next to nothing.The only thing about the Razer Viper Mini that could potentially sway consumers away from it is its form factor. The only reason it's able to reach such a low weight is due to how small it is. People with large hands will find this mouse hard to use. The Viper Mini also doesn't come with grip tape like the Viper Ultimate or the Basilisk Ultimate, but its low cost of $40 AUD makes up for that.Overall I definitely recommend this product if you're in the need of a great budget mouse.

name: Razer Viper Ultimate Lightweight Wireless Gaming Mouse & RGB Charging Dock: Hyperspeed Wireless Technology - 20K DPI Optical Sensor - 78g - Optical Mouse Switch - 70 Hr Battery - Quartz Pink
reviews: It’s so good, mainly for its light weight and good clicks, would recommend. I bought this wanting a better gaming mouse from a name brand, and found this. A week after I got it I started butterfly clicking and even though this is a jitter clicking mouse, it is an amazing all-around gaming mouse and would buy again. EDIT: After a good 6 months or so later I still love this mouse and frequently use it but there are a few problems, Sometimes the click creaks and squeaks but it isn’t enough to bug me enough to buy another mouse. The other problem is the software. The software is pretty average. All it does is rob but there is some weird other software which tells me that I can’t change my RGB to what I personally want it to change to. But other than those little problems it is a flawless mouse and would buy it again. 🖱

name: Razer Viper Ultimate Lightweight Wireless Gaming Mouse & RGB Charging Dock: Hyperspeed Wireless Technology - 20K DPI Optical Sensor - 78g - Optical Mouse Switch - 70 Hr Battery - Quartz Pink
reviews: Great value mice, bought as something to quickly replace a favourite g502 (a substantially larger and heavier mouse esp. with all weights in). Buttons are industry standard. Cable is light, even with 80% hanging off the table. Razer Synapse is tolerable.The default lift off height felt noticeably high with a soft cloth mousepad (DM PAD L), so much that I've had to calibrate using the software to the Razer Vespula V2 Cloth and reduce 'Lift-Off Range' to 1.Now my main gripe with the mouse and what prompted me to write this review is the scroll wheel. Other reviewers mention issues with the scroll wheel click or a lack of free scroll, but worse yet I often find myself fiddling with a scroll wheel that triggers a stutter scroll in the opposite direction each swipe of the wheel either due to a lack of tactility or resistance or design of the scroll wheel... or a firmware(?) issue. This could be manufacturing deviance.This frustration builds up if you scroll a lot, and if you've found this review, I can imagine you might have scrolled quite a bit.

It gets clogged up quite often and needs to have the dust removed every 2-3 days on average.

reviews: Has great buttons, very light, the scroll wheel is solid, clicking feels quick and responsive, sensor is good, the cable is very springy and won't need a mouse bungee. reviews: This device has a specific problem where it will detect a "scroll down" when you are scrolling up.  I've had mine replaced multiple times by Razer, and the issue persists even on their replacement models.  You can google this issue and find it pretty frequently.

I recommend people to look into other budget mouse options and avoid the razer viper mini. I've had bad experiences with razer in the past and it looks like I'm not going to buy another one of their products ever again.

reviews: This shirt feels great and I use it as an undershirt so I don’t have to wash my biking overshirts as much and have them get stinky, etc.It is 95% polyester, 5% “elastane”NOTE1: Don’t buy the other, similar, UA “tech 2.0” ones because they have seams that go from the arm joint towards the neck, and I feel that seam rub against my collar bone. This one has the seam right around the arm joint. You can see this in the pics of the various shirtsAlso, the other ones are pure polyester, no elastane, and this one feels the smoothest against my skin (like cool silk)NOTE2: I like a snug fit and usually wear a “M” t-shirt but for all these UA shirts I get them one size down, “S”, which fits nice and snug

reviews: Días antes de hacer la compra por Amazon, estuve en un famoso centro comercial y aproveché para ver que talla me quedaba mejor. Bueno cuando me iba, me volví y saqué una foto a una de las camisetas que estaba allí colgadas (En este caso la talla M es la imagen del centro comercial). Sabiendo como era el producto y la talla, pues me pedí por Amazon el mismo color y la talla LG. A lo que voy, he comparado ambas camisetas y es el mismo tejido, mismo color y ambas están fabricadas en Jordania. Doy fe que es original y por el tacto se nota. La verdad que estoy contento con la compra y me salió a muy buen precio con la oferta que pusieron en Amazon.

date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 11 March 2024

name: Carhartt
reviews: **Zuverlässiges und Beliebtes Work Utility T-Shirt von Carhartt**Das Carhartt Herren Work Utility T-Shirt hat sich zu meinem Lieblings-Shirt entwickelt, und das aus guten Gründen. Dieses T-Shirt ist nicht nur bequem und strapazierfähig, sondern auch äußerst funktional für den Einsatz bei der Arbeit oder in der Freizeit.Die Qualität des Materials ist bemerkenswert, und es hält auch nach mehrmaligem Tragen und Waschen seine Form und Farbe. Die Passform ist perfekt, und die verstärkten Nähte sorgen für zusätzliche Haltbarkeit, was besonders wichtig ist, wenn das Shirt für harte Arbeitseinsätze verwendet wird.Darüber hinaus ist das schlichte Design vielseitig und passt gut zu verschiedenen Outfits. Alles in allem kann ich das Carhartt Work Utility T-Shirt uneingeschränkt empfehlen und verstehe gut, warum es zu Ihrem Lieblings-Shirt geworden ist.

name: Carhartt
reviews: La camiseta Carhartt para hombre es una prenda que combina durabilidad, comodidad y estilo de una manera excepcional. Desde el momento en que la pones, puedes sentir la calidad de los materiales y la atención al detalle que caracteriza a esta marca.Lo que más destaca de esta camiseta es su resistencia. Está diseñada para resistir el desgaste diario, ya sea en el trabajo o en actividades al aire libre. El tejido es robusto y bien construido, lo que significa que no tienes que preocuparte por rasgaduras o deterioro prematuro.Además de su durabilidad, la comodidad es otro punto a favor. Aunque es resistente, la camiseta es sorprendentemente suave al tacto y se ajusta de manera cómoda al cuerpo sin restringir el movimiento. Es perfecta para usar durante largas jornadas laborales o para actividades que requieren movilidad.En cuanto al estilo, la camiseta Carhartt para hombre tiene un diseño clásico y atemporal que se adapta a cualquier ocasión. Ya sea que la combines con unos jeans para un look casual o la uses debajo de una chaqueta para un estilo más elegante, esta camiseta agrega un toque de robustez y autenticidad a tu vestuario.En resumen, la camiseta Carhartt para hombre es una inversión que vale la pena. Con su durabilidad, comodidad y estilo, es una opción versátil que te acompañará durante mucho tiempo, sin importar las condiciones en las que te encuentres.

name: Carhartt
reviews: som andra har nämnt den är stor i storlek. Är vanligtvis L men tog M och den funkar perfekt.

Achtung: Da Carhartt und nicht Carhartt WIP eigentlich für den amerikanischen Markt gedacht und fallen daher sehr groß aus. Mindestens eine Nummer kleiner kaufen, wenn nicht sogar zwei

reviews: Have been buying Duluth Trading Company shirts for more money and finally decided to give these a try for a cheaper price. Would recommend and very happy with the purchase. They run a little large, nice weight and feel sturdy enough for hard labor. Not recommended for hot weather.

name: Carhartt
reviews: Tengan en cuenta que es relaxed fit, si están pensando comprar esta playera compárenla en la talla habitual, a menos que les guste que les quede entallada elije una talla menos.

name: Carhartt

name: Carhartt
reviews: Bei meiner Arbeit im Metallbau trage ich sehr gerne Shirts von Carhartt. Die Shirts sind sehr langlebig und robust. Ihre Verarbeitung ist sehr gut. Hatte bisher noch keine schlechten Nähte die aufgingen.Gerade im Winter trage ich sie auch gerne unter dem Pulli, da sie anders als normale dünne  0815-Shirts, durch ihre angenehme Stoffdicke auch prima wärmen.Alles in Allem sehr gute Shirts die auch was aushalten.

name: Carhartt
reviews: Quienes conocen la marca saben que la garantía es total!

name: Carhartt
reviews: Die T-Shirts sind der Hammer, allerdings darauf achten mit 60% Baumwolle wählen, diese sind von Form und was Thema zusammen legen  nach dem waschen angeht spitze.Die mit 100% eher verzogen und schnell außer Form.

name: Carhartt
reviews: Ich habe mir dieses Carhartt- T-Shirt in in XXL bestellt, und bin davon ausgegangen das es passt. Ich habe bereits einige andere T-Shirts des Herstellers, und bisher lag ich mit XXL immer richtig.Scheinbar ist allerdings der Schnitt dieses T-Shirts deutlich weiter, so das XXL viel zu groß ausfiel. Daher meine Empfehlung diese T-Shirts einfach eine Größe kleiner als gewöhnlich zu bestellen.Denn qualitativ gibt es gar nicht zu meckern. Ganz im Gegenteil, die Stoffqualität ist sehr dick und fest, und die Materialanmutung ist deutlich hochwertiger als bei manch anderer Marke.Ich musste mein Produkt leider zurückschicken, bestelle es mir aber eine Größe kleiner erneut.

name: Carhartt
reviews: Queda de maravilla y buen material

name: Carhartt
reviews: Un producto de excelente calidad, mi armario esta llena de ellas, las uso a diario como vestimenta casual, quizá un poco largas de las mangas, pero las doblo y queda bien.

name: Carhartt

name: Carhartt
reviews: The medium shirt I ordered fits as a large, people claiming it is true to size are crazy, I've never had a medium shirt fit like this. The length of the shirt is way too long, the sleeves almost go past my elbow and for a fit that they claim  is "a closer fit to the body built for work" it is quite baggy. Maybe they are designed for big boned people (the brand is American so makes sense).

name: Carhartt
reviews: This product is as expected. Sizing looks correct and quality is good.My only issue is the packaging this was delivered in. I brought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. As with 99% of items brought from amazon items are delivered in cardboard packaging. This item was delivered in a see through plastic bag, and my husband was the one who got delivered it. So his Christmas present is no longer a surprise.Just something to think about if you are buying this for a gift and that person lives at the same address as you.Otherwise great product.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 20 December 2022

name: Carhartt
reviews: Carhartt got carried away with sizing nomenclature and decided they’d call the regular sizes ‘Relaxed Fit’ while calling the relaxed fit ‘Loose Fit’. These t-shirts were Regular (Relaxed Fit) and fit nicely. Sturdy material and seams. Until they start sizing stuff in a normal manner, I’m taking a star off.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 29 March 2024

name: Urban Classics Men's Shaped Long
reviews: Everything was perfect with this order - the delivery way in advance, the product completely corresponds to description and fits. Love it.

name: Urban Classics Men's Shaped Long
reviews: Ordered XL but were M at most. Shirts started disintegrating after the first wash and tore almost in half just by taking them off.Would make a good prop for anyone needing a shirt that can be torn off with a single hand

name: Urban Classics Men's Shaped Long
reviews: As expected for the price. Poor quality and far, far too short in length and upper arm.

name: Urban Classics Men's Shaped Long
reviews: Ho acquistato la maglietta URBAN CLASSICS Long per me stesso e devo dire che sono rimasto molto soddisfatto. La maglietta è realizzata in cotone 100%, è molto morbida e confortevole da indossare. Il taglio è rilassato, ma non troppo, quindi è perfetta per essere indossata in ogni occasione.Il design della maglietta è semplice, ma elegante. Lo scollo rotondo è classico e il colore beige è versatile e si abbina a tutto. La maglietta è disponibile in diversi colori e taglie, quindi si adatta a tutti gli stili e le corporature.La maglietta è stata lavata più volte in lavatrice e non ha perso colore o forma. È anche molto resistente, quindi non si rovina facilmente.Nel complesso, sono molto soddisfatto dell'acquisto della maglietta. È un capo di qualità, confortevole e versatile, perfetto per tutti i giorni.Ecco alcuni dei pro della maglietta:Realizzata in cotone 100%Morbida e confortevoleTaglio rilassatoDesign semplice ed eleganteDisponibile in diversi colori e taglieResistenteConsiglio:Ho apprezzato particolarmente il fatto che la maglietta sia disponibile in diverse taglie. Ho preso la taglia M e mi sta alla perfezione. Sono alto 1,84 m e peso 77 kg. Di solito prendo L ma vista la calzata ho preso una taglia in meno e ho fatto bene.Inoltre, la maglietta è molto versatile. La indosso per andare al lavoro, per uscire con gli amici. È sempre comoda e mi fa sentire a mio agio.

name: Urban Classics Men's Shaped Long
reviews: Pour avoir pris une grande taille et peur que sa soit trop petit je suis agréablement surpris, le tee-shirt tombe super bien et habille super bien pour tout personne en forte corpulence c'est le produit parfait.

name: Urban Classics Men's Shaped Long
reviews: J'ai commandé et reçu le modèle blanc en 5XL. Longueur 5XL annoncée de 91,5cm 84cm constatée après lavage à 40 degrés. Modèle moulant annoncé mais trop large (un modèle Primark ou Action 2XL est lui conforme à cette définition grâce à la présence d'elastane mais n'est malheureusement pas plus long).

Lengte is iets langer dan normaal en valt prima om de shirt in de broek te plaatsen zonder dat het eruit valt. Heb al meer dan 12 stuks van dit model gekocht. En daarvan zijn 4 na 2 jaar versleten bij dagelijks gebruik. Het merk is een aanrader.

name: Urban Classics Men's Shaped Long
reviews: Das Urban Classics Herren Shaped Long Tee in der Farbe Jasper ist ein echtes Highlight in meiner Garderobe. Die Farbe ist genau wie abgebildet, ein schönes, tiefes Grün, das zu vielen anderen Farben passt. Was mir besonders gefällt, ist der Schnitt des T-Shirts: Es ist lang geschnitten, was einen modernen und stylischen Look erzeugt. Der Stoff fühlt sich hochwertig und weich auf der Haut an, was für hohen Tragekomfort sorgt. Auch nach mehreren Wäschen hat das T-Shirt seine Form und Farbe behalten, was für die Qualität spricht. Es passt perfekt zu Jeans oder Chinos und eignet sich sowohl für den Alltag als auch für lässige Anlässe. Ich bin sehr zufrieden mit meinem Kauf und kann dieses T-Shirt jedem empfehlen, der nach einem bequemen und modischen Kleidungsstück sucht.

name: Urban Classics Men's Shaped Long
reviews: Maglietta basic di buon cotone, svariati e piacevoli toni di colore abbinabili a qualunque outfit.Ha un buon taglio lungo, adatta quindi a chi è alto e vuole evitare maglie troppo corte.Dopo molti lavaggi a 20° i colori hanno una buona tenuta e il cotone non restringe.

name: Urban Classics Men's Shaped Long
reviews: Qualité correcte mais loin d'être top, comme toujours avec cette marque. Quoi qu'il en soit leurs produits sont aussi toujours bien positionnés, il n'y a qu'à faire une recherche sur des produits similaires, vous ne trouverez probablement rien à moins du double de ce prix!

name: Under Armour Men's HeatGear Compression Long-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: J'ai récemment acheté ce produit, et je suis absolument ravi de cet achat. C'est un vêtement de sport qui offre une combinaison parfaite de confort, et de performance.Tout d'abord, la qualité de fabrication est impressionnante. Les coutures sont solides, le tissu est léger et respirant, ce qui en fait un choix idéal pour diverses activités sportives. J'ai particulièrement apprécié la technologie anti-odeur qui fonctionne vraiment bien, assurant une sensation de fraîcheur même après une séance d'entraînement intense.Le design est à la fois élégant et fonctionnel. La coupe ajustée épouse parfaitement la silhouette sans sacrifier la liberté de mouvement.Ce T-shirt a également prouvé sa polyvalence. Que ce soit pour la course à pied, l'entraînement en salle, ou même pour un usage quotidien décontracté, il répond à toutes mes attentes.Je le recommande vivement et lui attribue sans hésiter cinq étoiles bien méritées.

name: Under Armour Men's HeatGear Compression Long-Sleeve T-Shirt

name: Under Armour Men's HeatGear Compression Long-Sleeve T-Shirt
reviews: Das Armour Herren HeatGear Armour Unterhemd ist schlichtweg fantastisch! Als jemand, der viel Sport treibt und auf hochwertige Sportbekleidung angewiesen ist, hat mich dieses Unterhemd in jeder Hinsicht beeindruckt.Zunächst einmal ist das Material absolut erstklassig. Das HeatGear-Gewebe ist nicht nur äußerst angenehm auf der Haut, sondern leitet auch Schweiß effizient ab. Egal, ob ich beim Laufen ins Schwitzen komme oder während eines intensiven Workouts – dieses Unterhemd hält mich stets angenehm trocken und kühl. Die Atmungsaktivität ist wirklich beeindruckend.Die Passform ist genau richtig. Es schmiegt sich an meinen Körper an, ohne dabei einzuengen, und ermöglicht eine uneingeschränkte Bewegungsfreiheit. Auch nach mehreren Wäschen behält es seine Form und Elastizität bei.Die Haltbarkeit dieses Unterhemds ist ebenfalls bemerkenswert. Ich habe es seit Monaten im regelmäßigen Einsatz, und es zeigt keinerlei Abnutzungserscheinungen. Die Nähte sind robust und die Farben verblassen nicht.Das schlichte Design des Unterhemds gefällt mir ebenfalls sehr gut. Es lässt sich problemlos mit anderen Sportbekleidungsstücken kombinieren und sieht auch solo getragen stylisch aus.Zusammengefasst kann ich sagen, dass das Armour Herren HeatGear Armour Unterhemd die perfekte Kombination aus Komfort, Leistung und Langlebigkeit bietet. Egal, ob beim Training oder im Alltag, dieses Unterhemd hat sich als zuverlässiger Begleiter erwiesen. Ich kann es uneingeschränkt empfehlen und werde definitiv noch weitere davon kaufen.

reviews: BOSS T-Shirt überzeugt mit seinem zeitlosen Design und hochwertigen Materialien. Die Baumwollqualität fühlt sich angenehm auf der Haut an und verleiht dem Shirt eine luxuriöse Note. Die Passform ist durchdacht und bietet einen schmeichelhaften Schnitt, der sowohl bequem als auch stilvoll ist.Die Verarbeitung des T-Shirts ist exzellent, was sich in den feinen Nähten und der detailreichen Gestaltung zeigt. Das dezente BOSS-Logo verleiht dem Shirt eine subtile Eleganz, ohne dabei zu aufdringlich zu wirken (für mich ist das der Grund für den Kauf)

name: BOSS Hugo Mens 50325887 T-Shirt Rn 3p Co Base Layer Top - Multi
reviews: Das Material des T-Shirts ist bemerkenswert weich und angenehm auf der Haut. Es fühlt sich luxuriös an, kratzt nicht und bietet einen hohen Tragekomfort.Jedoch möchte ich darauf hinweisen, dass die Größe "L" deutlich kleiner ausfällt als erwartet. Ich hatte sie eigentlich für meinen Mann bestellt, aber sie passten ihm leider nicht richtig. Trotzdem haben wir uns entschieden, die Shirts zu behalten, da sie mir als Frau mit eigentlich Größe "M" perfekt passen. Es ist also wichtig, die Größenangaben sorgfältig zu überprüfen und gegebenenfalls eine Nummer größer zu bestellen.Abgesehen von der Größenproblematik sind die Shirts von BOSS von hoher Qualität. Sie sehen stilvoll aus und haben eine gute Formbeständigkeit. Die Farben strahlen schön und die Nähte halten gut.

name: BOSS Hugo Mens 50325887 T-Shirt Rn 3p Co Base Layer Top - Multi

name: NAUTICA Men's Short Sleeve Solid Slim Fit V-Neck T-Shirt
reviews: El artículo llegó bien y antes del día establecido. Ya había comprado otra playera color verde y la he usado y lavado en varias ocasiones: su uso es muy agradable porque te da libertad de movimiento para el ejercicio y al mismo tiempo es fresca, lo cual en estos días calurosos de primavera es una ventaja, su corte es moderno y no es muy ajustado a la cintura como en el caso de otras que resaltan la cinturita de avispa y el pecho de atleta, además sin problema de decoloración o encogimiento en el lavado, que yo lo hago en la lavadora. Excelente prenda que te sirve para hacer deporte o para acomodarla con unos jeans y salir a cualquier paseo. La playera es muy cómoda y responde exactamente a los colores que muestran en línea. Definitivamente la recomiendo.

name: NAUTICA Men's Short Sleeve Solid Slim Fit V-Neck T-Shirt
reviews: I like the fit. It gives me great look without being to fit. Yet, it gives me the right look for me. Recommend that if you don’t suffer from a large belly, take a size that will sit on you just about right. The fabric and color are great and durable and I order them on a regular basis.

reviews: La combinación de algodón con elastano es una genialidad ya que la prenda se arruga menos, se decolora menos y no pierde su forma con el tiempo. Me cuesta trabajo encontrar ropa que me quede perfecta, pero con estas playeras NAÚTICA el problema está resuelto. El ajuste es perfecto tanto de largo, anchoy longitud de la manga (quedan ligeramente por arriba de la mitad del brazo) y son muy frescas. Me gustaron tanto que tengo más de 10 de todos los colores y algunas del mismo color pero con cuello en V y redondo. 100 % recomendables.

name: Champion Mens GT22H Graphic Jersey Muscle Sleeveless Shirt
reviews: I love sleeveless shirts because it's comfortable like a t-shirt, and loose fitting like a tank top.I'm a tall guy (6'5") and I bought the large size. Here is my feedback after wearing and washing it twice:Pros:- Fast delivery- White shirt looks fantastic- Length is great for my long torso- I washed in warm and hung dry with no change in shape or color.- Makes my arms look good! HahaCons:- Fabric could be a bit softer- It's a touch too baggy for me, but then again, I have gotten used to it and it still looks really good on me being tall and slim.- It's a bit expensive.Final Thoughts:I am happy with this purchase and ended up buying the dark blue one too. I really like these shirts and I feel they are worth the money even though you are paying for the brand name. I do recommend this shirt, especially if you have a longer torso like me.Hope this helps!! Thanks.

name: Champion Mens GT22H Graphic Jersey Muscle Sleeveless Shirt
reviews: This tank is very stylish and comfortable. I bought the iconic Champion blue. It is 100% cotton. It is true to the size. I’m 75KG and 175cm and the size of M fits me well. I wear it to the beach all day long. I recommend this product.

name: Champion Mens GT22H Graphic Jersey Muscle Sleeveless Shirt
reviews: This is actually a good product, the material isn’t that thick cotton feel that champion uses as a signature material on most of there regular sleeved shirts. This is a regular standers thin cotton. Important to know that the shoulders extend outward. Further than most sleeveless tanks. I think this is just a style for this design. Some tanks don’t have an extended shoulder. This one does. The size is a bit bigger. Don’t expect a perfect fit. I wouldn’t say order a size down but expect it to feel loose and a bit baggy. This is not fitted, so all you body builders who want that snugged feel or to accent your small waist and emphasize your shoulders this isn’t the fit. It’s a bit more boxy. The solid logo on the back of the shirt gives it a very expansive casual feel. So this is gym appropriate but also going for a walk down the pier and grabbing an outdoor lunch appropriate too. This look will def compliment a chain and bracelet  accessories without you looking too try hard. Over all def worth the price point! Finally another amazon hit. Go for it! Wish they had more grey in stock tho.

reviews: As someone who values both comfort and style in everyday wear, the Champion Men's Muscle T-Shirt has become a staple in my wardrobe, and for good reason.First and foremost, the fit of this muscle tee is exceptional. It strikes the perfect balance between being snug enough to highlight your physique without feeling restrictive. The cut accentuates the shoulders and arms, making it an ideal choice for those who want to showcase their hard work in the gym. The length is just right – not too short, not too long – allowing for versatility in styling, whether tucked in for a polished look or worn untucked for a casual vibe.

name: Real Essentials 5 Pack: Men's Dry-Fit Sweat Resistant Active Athletic Performance Shorts
reviews: These shorts are super comfortable and good for the gym. The order was good except for the one short they sent that was the wrong size. Another important thing to mention is that when stretched, they are translucent since the fabric is not very thick.  So make sure you use compression pants or dark undergarments beneath these shorts. Otherwise, they work well for exercises that need lots of flexibility, squatting, etc. They are also very comfortable to wear at home! I love this product and will probably order more in the future. Great money value and great quality. Very satisfied!

name: Real Essentials 5 Pack: Men's Dry-Fit Sweat Resistant Active Athletic Performance Shorts
reviews: I recently purchased the Real Essentials 5 Pack: Men's Mesh Athletic Performance Gym Shorts with Pockets, and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. These shorts have quickly become my go-to choice for workouts and daily activities.First and foremost, the comfort level of these shorts is unparalleled. The mesh fabric is lightweight and breathable, ensuring that I stay cool and comfortable even during intense workouts. The airy feel of the material is perfect for hot summer days and high-intensity exercises.The fit is spot on. I ordered my usual size, and the shorts fit me perfectly, providing a comfortable and non-restrictive feel. The elastic waistband offers a secure yet flexible fit, allowing for a full range of motion during exercises.The addition of pockets is a game-changer. I love having the convenience of pockets to hold my essentials, such as my phone and keys, during my gym sessions. It eliminates the need for carrying a separate bag, streamlining my workouts and making them more enjoyable.The 5-pack option is fantastic value for money. I now have a variety of colors to choose from, and each pair is equally comfortable and well-made. The quality of the construction is evident, and I can tell that these shorts are built to withstand frequent use.Moreover, these shorts are not only great for the gym but also perfect for various activities and casual wear. Whether I'm running errands, playing sports, or simply lounging at home, these shorts are my reliable choice.Cleaning and maintaining these shorts is a breeze. They wash well, and the color and shape remain intact even after multiple washes.In conclusion, the Real Essentials Men's Mesh Athletic Performance Gym Shorts with Pockets are a must-have for any active individual. Their comfort, perfect fit, and functional design make them an excellent choice for workouts and daily wear. With the added bonus of pockets and the value of the 5-pack, this purchase has exceeded my expectations in every way. I highly recommend these gym shorts to anyone in need of comfortable and versatile activewear. I am thrilled with my purchase and will definitely be buying more from Real Essentials in the future!

reviews: These well-made shorts keep one comfortable whether working out or lounging around the house. Light-weight and airy, they feel almost like wearing nothing. Unfortunately when they arrived, when viewing the colors as I unpacked them it was like opening a package of merchandise someone else had ordered. The image shows at the top the shorts as they're displayed in the listing, and at the bottom of the image is a photo of the shorts as they arrived. Except for the medium green and the bright blue I am hard pressed to tell which is which. Instead of five pairs of shorts that range in colors from light to medium I've received five pairs of dark colored shorts. My only dissatisfaction is with the colors that arrived. Regrettably, the fact that I did not receive the colors I ordered has slightly diminished their "value for money."

name: Real Essentials 5 Pack: Men's Dry-Fit Sweat Resistant Active Athletic Performance Shorts
reviews: I have two sets of these shorts, one I purchased in august of 2020 and one in august 2021. Clearly I went back to buy another set a year later so I must like them, and I do. They are priced INCREDIBLY well. At the time of the first purchase, I had just started playing sports again and needed lightweight shorts to cut and move in. These are DEFINITELY those shorts. They breath very well, they're comfortable enough that now I not only work out in them, I lounge around the house in them and go to sleep in them as well. They've held up pretty well to washing. I wash them on hot with powdered detergent and oxiclean powder and rinse them twice and then dry them on medium heat. They've probably gone through at least 100 washes thus far and I'm still wearing them. Yes, some of the seams have loose thread, yes some of them start to come off over time but they're $6 a short and none of them have unraveled to the point that there are any holes or they are unwearable, it's just something you would see when you look at the inner part of the waistband.The ONE weakness of these shorts is the pockets. I've had several that have started developing holes in the side seams of the pockets. Now it only started happening a year+ later and they've been beat up and washed many times so that's not quite so bad, but still it'll happen. I suspect this is more to do with how big and heavy phones are nowadays since it's always on my right pocket (where my phone goes) and started pretty much after I upgraded from an iphone 7 to an iphone 13 pro. But two years and 100+ aggressive washings later, only 3 out of 10 shorts have pocket holes and only one has a hole big enough that I'm scared to put my phone in the pocket.These are fantastic shorts and they could easily charge double. I plan to replace some of the original ones with a new set even now.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 September 2022

name: Real Essentials 5 Pack: Men's Dry-Fit Sweat Resistant Active Athletic Performance Shorts
reviews: Purchased: Small Men’sSize of wearer: 5’6”; 116 lbs.My slim 14-year-old asked for new shorts recently.He likes loose, simple designs with 2 pockets.These polyester shorts fit the bill.He likes the patterned design on the side, with each pair having a different color matching the short color.They fall right below his knee-cap.He says he loves how stretchy the elastic waist-band feels and that they're "really comfortable."Nice fit, great price for five pairs.

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I am able to wear shorts to work and I saw these and figured to give them a try.  First I must say, as a guy I am used to the demin or thick cotton feel for pants/shorts, these are not that feel. These are a stretchy material. When wearing them they are very comfortable and when you sit, as a guy the material is stretchy so you can sit down comfortably without issues. They look like regular shorts, I feel the waistband is a little wider but not in a bad way. I have washed this pair 3x now, they wash well, no fading or coming apart as I read in one review but they do look wrinkly, not bad enough to have to iron them, besides when you put them on the wrinkles seem to go away, I think its the stretchy material that makes them look that way. I paid $27 for this paid off shorts and it's about as hight as I would want to pay. I do need to mention that I did order a second pair, black as these are more of an olive color.  I hope this review helps.

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I was looking for shorts that were lightweight, wrinkle resistant, and flexible for a trip to Europe. I was also looking for extra pockets, but I don't like cargo pants with flaps or buttons. Wrangler had the perfect answer. These shorts fit great, and the material (mostly nylon) is lightweight and flexible. They come with two zipper pockets that are perfect for traveling or day-to-day. They are cut a bit narrow in the leg, which is fine for me (5'10", 170lb.) I bought granite (dark gray) and sagebrush (grayish green). I tried the bronze but didn't like the color. I wish they came in a lighter shade, like khaki or beige.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 August 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Size: I'm legit 38" if not a little more. A lot of the reviews say true to size so I ordered the 38".  If I lost a pound and jumped up and down they would have fallen to my ankles.  I guess if you like wearing a belt and like that really loose feel then stick to the 38".  I'm big shoulders no butt so I need that little bit of extra tension to keep my drawers up. I reordered the 36" and they fit great. Puts the "Flex" to a little but of test but that's what it's there for and it's comfortable. Also the smaller size looks better because the legs aren't so large. There was a huger difference between the 38" and 36".Performance: I usually graduate my clothes to "yard gear" after they have had a year or so of normal wear. I immediately put these to the test doing yard work and I will wear these from now on.  They were light which kept me cool, the waist was flexible but comfortably snug and the front pockets were deep enough to hold my phone with no issues. I push-mow a large yard and bag the clippings. My neighbors will appreciate that now when I bend over to remove the bagger they won't be confused that a plumber is doing my yardwork. Highly recommend these and also recommend the Flex version of the Wrangler jeans that are sized in a similar fashion.  I have bought another pair and will likely buy a few more. I would even work out at the gym in these when that time comes... maybe having these will motivate me to get there.

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: First, the description of these cargo shorts on Amazon is totally inadequate. The absolutely most important feature of these shorts that is not evident on the Amazon web site is that they truly have STRETCH. I an a waist 33 and I ordered a 32. They fit perfectly since the waist and the pants have great stretch. They would also fit perfectly for someone with a 32 inch waist. Too many pants on the internet are described as having a stretch feature, but in fact do not. Secondly, there is not description of the pockets. These shorts have 7 pockets, but you would not know it from the website. Zippers are on the two side cargo pockets so you can secure your phone and wallet in these pockets if you will be exercising. The other pockets are deep, as is the "watch" pocket. Great fabric. I reordered another pair after wearing the first pair. Can't address durability, but they are made much better than my other cargo shorts. Great buy!!

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I recently bought a pair of Wrangler "Outdoor Series" cargo shorts on clearance at a local Target store, model NT980GT. I really like the fit and the fabric and the zipper side pockets. Come to find out they were discontinued, but my searches kept bringing me back to these Wrangler "Authentics" cargo shorts, model ZM980GT. After carefully looking at the pictures and comparing them to my Outdoor Series pair, the pockets, the stitching, etc, appeared to be exactly the same. So I bought a pair in the hopes they were.While almost identical, this newer Authentics version is a little different than those discontinued Outdoor Series pair. First, they're about an inch longer. Not a huge difference, but I'm 6'2" and I prefer where the Outdoor Series shorts sit above my knee. The second thing I noticed is they're slightly slimmer in fit, just a little less room around. And the waistband seems less stretchy. They clearly went cheap on the new zippers. Most people won't notice or care, but after having the better, lock-down zipper heads on the Outdoor Series, these cheap floppy zipper heads are just annoying to me. And while both shorts are listed as Granite (GT), these are lighter in color.Honestly though, for all my moaning about these slight differences, if I didn't already have the older version I wouldn't know and would be perfectly happy with these shorts. They are still just as comfortable, made with the same nylon/spandex mix, and seem just as well stitched together. Knowing the differences, my only real gripe is the zippers. Still very comfortable and well fitting shorts.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 8 March 2018

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: My husband loves these shorts. They're stretchy and soft. He loves the way they fit him too. He wears a 35 normally but he got a 36 in these and they're just fine. I think they look nice on him.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 10 August 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I wanted shorts that were comfortable and kids could wear to school.  They don't like pants and it's not very cold here. They looks really nice.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 5 September 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: The fit is comfortable, no "baggyness" and the fabric has give to it so hikes and long walks should be comfortable.  With the exception of two of the front pockets which are shallow and up high on the shorts, there is ample space for your keys, wallet and phone.  Pretty nice product for the price.  Certainly a lot less expensive than the Lululemon Men's hiking shorts.  Let's see how they last.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 2 May 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: So they're the most comfortable shorts I've ever worn, But. They don't hold up all that great, Atleast not in comparison to traditional wrangler shorts. They could easily be used as swim trunks and they feel like a mixture of that and normal shorts. Pockets functioned better than expected and I'll buy another pair to see if they'll share the same weak points such as inner thighs and the taint seam. Every now and then I get a loose thread too, No big deal but something you'd notice if bought. Would recomend going a size up if you've owned a pair previously, Bought my second pair and initial fit is awful. I'm sitting with them on to write this review incase another larger gentleman is considering these shorts. GO A SIZE UP. Other than that they were good enough to want another pair, So there's that. They'll definitely appear tight in your normal size, They hug pretty good so larger size won't hurt.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 9 May 2021

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I bought these shorts as a present for my husband and he really, really likes them.  He likes them so much that these shorts are nearly the only ones he wears.  He loves the color-a dark khaki, the fit--perfect on him, and the leg pockets.  He has four pairs now and wants some more.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 27 April 2023

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: Stretchy, excellent fit, my husband doesn’t like any other shorts but these! Hopefully they stay available for a long time!Bought him 3 pairs 2 years ago and they just started ripping after years of working construction. Bought 3 more pairs last week and they haven’t changed!

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: These shorts are extremely comfortable, lightweight, and have well designed pockets. Most shorts of this type have the lower right hand zip pocket too low, causing the cell phone to repeatedly bang into the knee, and the pocket is too wide, allowing the phone to settle into a “landscape” position which is uncomfortable and annoying. The Wrangler zip pocket is positioned higher on the right thigh and narrow enough to hold an iPhone X vertical. Bought two pairs then bought two more and four of the pants version of these shorts. I wouldn’t have purchased that many unless they were really that good. 👍👍
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 October 2022

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: As advertised and when i purchasd was the same price as products from wal mart.

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I have had other Wrangler outdoor shorts. I really liked the quality and the durability. They fit perfectly as expected and wore great. I purchased another pair from Wrangler through Amazon thinking I was getting what i got before. These were TERRIBLE. But i gave it another chance. And am I happy about it! If you like nice fitting, stretchy waist band, sort of cargo like shorts, get these. The material is great, the fit is perfect and i suspect the durability will be like the first few pairs I got a long time ago. Way to go Wrangler!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 10 October 2022

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: At waist sizes 40 and above, the waist fits perfect, but the sizing around the thighs don't increase in proportion.

name: Wrangler Mens Performance Comfort Flex Waist Cargo Short Cargo Shorts
reviews: I love these shorts.  They fit great and extremely comfortable.  I like the look of them.  I have bought a few in different colors
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 June 2023
